message.body: haaay wyd ? dont tell anyone im talking to you i gotta ask u something
Lol ok I mean I'm out with Steph, patsy & John but what's up?
okaaay ill talk to you laterrr dont tell anyoneee that i texted you
So what's up? I'm they aren't with me anymore
Yes so am I... you're no where near fat. You're not even chunky or anything. You're built amazing and are a perfect build
awwhhh thank you so much midgeee. dont say anythingg but dawn was snapping about a cup in the sink and i was like it wasnt mee and she started snapping and lisa
call someone fat when im already insecure with my body like that hurt my feelings

Ok you also have to realize 1- that dawn is going thru withdraw. Cigarettes are like drugs. They contain an addictive drug. Her going thru withdraw is going to take effect on her.... when I quit smoking I snapped on anyone who even said hi to me. I was going crazy bec my body stopped getting something it was needing. I couldn't control iy.... 2- if she is snapping and you embarrassed her by calling her rude in front of someone else of course she is only going to get more pissed off and embarrass you too...
but she just snapped out of nowhere and she always calls me chunky and makes me feel bad about myself midge even when she was smoking
So don't sweat it. Yes she hurt you but I'm sure she didn't mean it. She not In the right mind and you added to the fire.
You're beautiful so ignore it. You're welcome
